description: A responsible and essential unisex hoody sweatshirt made of 100% Regenerative Organic Certified™ cotton from farms practicing the highest organic standard, which aims to rehabilitate soil, respect animal welfare and improve the lives of farmers. These practices reduce greenhouse gas emissions and could help trap more carbon than conventional agriculture. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Regenerative Organic Certified Cotton Hoody Sweatshirt - Unisex
